text: It looks like Katie Holmes and Jamie Foxx have ended their relationship before even going public with it! The pair is expecting a child together, but have decided not to go through with a wedding, according to a new report. Find out why here! Will Katie Holmes, 37, be raising another child all on her own?! She ’ s reportedly pregnant with Jamie Foxx ’ s baby, but while they originally wanted to take their relationship to the next level and get married, a new report claims the plans have drastically changed. Get the scoop right here! It was actually Jamie, 48, who originally got “ panicked ” about the pace at which things were moving, and asked the actress if they could postpone the wedding, according to OK! magazine.
